tr_quotes.quote: Sonu olan hayal kırıklığını kabul etmeliyiz, ama asla sonu olmayan umudu kaybetmemeliyiz.
tr_quotes.author: Martin Luther King Jr.

tr_quotes.quote: Ne bir gemi, ne de hayat, tek umuda bağlanmamalıdır.
tr_quotes.author: Epiktetos

tr_quotes.quote: Umutla yaşayan, müzik olmadan da dans eder.
tr_quotes.author: George Herbert

tr_quotes.quote: Ümit gidince, yaşamak zevki de gider.
tr_quotes.author: Emile Zola

tr_quotes.quote: Umut, uyanık insanların rüyasıdır.
tr_quotes.author: Aristoteles

tr_quotes.quote: Umut, cesaretin yarısıdır.
tr_quotes.author: Balzac

tr_quotes.quote: Bir yerde yaşam varsa, orada umut da vardır.
tr_quotes.author: Cicero

tr_quotes.quote: Tehlike büyüdükçe, ümit de büyür.
tr_quotes.author: Hölderlin

tr_quotes.quote: Ya ümitsizsiniz, ya da ümit sizsiniz.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Ümit gidince, yaşamak zevki de gider.
tr_quotes.author: Emile Zola

tr_quotes.quote: Umut, uyanık insanların rüyasıdır.
tr_quotes.author: Aristoteles

tr_quotes.quote: Umut yoksa girişim de yoktur.
tr_quotes.author: Samuel Johnson

tr_quotes.quote: Bir şeyden ümitsiz olan, ondan uzak olur.
tr_quotes.author: Hz. Ömer

tr_quotes.quote: Ertelenmiş umutlar perişan eder insanı.
tr_quotes.author: Elif Şafak

tr_quotes.quote: Her şeyin yok olduğu anda bile, ümit vardır.
tr_quotes.author: Thales

tr_quotes.quote: Umut, insanoğlunun bütün acılarının merhemidir.
tr_quotes.author: La Bretonne

tr_quotes.quote: Umut olmadan, umut edilen ele geçirilemez.
tr_quotes.author: Liesherak

tr_quotes.quote: Hayat dardır doğru; ama ümit de geniştir.
tr_quotes.author: Wolfgang Van Goethe

tr_quotes.quote: Umut olmadan, umulmayanı bulamayız.
tr_quotes.author: Roger Garaudy

tr_quotes.quote: Ne bir gemi tek demire bağlanır, ne de hayat tek bir ümide.
tr_quotes.author: Epiktotes

tr_quotes.quote: Ümit, saadetten alınmış bir miktar borçtur.
tr_quotes.author: Joseph Joubert

tr_quotes.quote: Sanayinin kamçılayıcısı, ilerleme gerçeği değil, umuttur.
tr_quotes.author: Robert Southy

tr_quotes.quote: Eski anılarımız, yeni umutlarımız olmalıdır.
tr_quotes.author: Arşene Houssaye

tr_quotes.quote: İnsana yapılacak en büyük kötülük; onu bir umudun içine hapsetmektir.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Tüm dünya vazgeç dediğinde umut fısıldar; bir kez daha dene.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Hepiniz, umudunuz kadar genç, yeisiniz kadar ihtiyarsınız.
tr_quotes.author: Samuel Ullman

tr_quotes.quote: Yeter ki umudun olsun, o ışık elbet bir yerden doğar hayatına
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Asla ümitsizliğe düşme; ama düşersen de çalışmanı sürdür.
tr_quotes.author: Edmund Burke

tr_quotes.quote: Ümitsizlik, sersemlerin elde ettiği bir neticedir.
tr_quotes.author: Benjamin Disraeli

tr_quotes.quote: Hiçbir şeye cesaret edemeyen, hiçbir şeye ümit beslemesin.
tr_quotes.author: Friedrich Schiller

tr_quotes.quote: Eğer ilim, ümit ile olsaydı, dünyadaki bütün insanlar alim olurdu.
tr_quotes.author: Hz. Ali

tr_quotes.quote: Hepimiz aynı bataklıkta yaşıyoruz; ama bazılarımız yıldızlara bakıyor.
tr_quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

tr_quotes.quote: Ümit, en bedbaht insanlardan bile ışığını esirgemez.
tr_quotes.author: Victor Von Schetffell

tr_quotes.quote: Umut; şimdi hiç görmeyen birine, gökkuşağını anlatmak kadar zor ve imkansız.
tr_quotes.author: Cem Adrian

tr_quotes.quote: Ümidimiz kalmayınca hepimiz, arzularımızla yaşamaya başlarız.
tr_quotes.author: Dante Alighieri

tr_quotes.quote: Umutla yolculuk etmek, gidilecek yere varmaktan çok daha zevklidir.
tr_quotes.author: Robert Louis Stevenson

tr_quotes.quote: Ümit, başlı başına bir mutluluktur, belki de mutlulukların en büyüğü.
tr_quotes.author: Samuel Johnson

tr_quotes.quote: Umudunu yitirme, şu hayatta bir şeyin bitişi, her zaman başka bir şeyin başlamasına sebep olmuştur.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Yaşamda ümitsiz durumlar yoktur, ümitsizlik besleyen insanlar vardır yalnızca.
tr_quotes.author: Clara Booth

tr_quotes.quote: Mağlubiyete uğrayınca ümitsizliğe kapılma, her başarısızlıkta bir zafer arzusu yatar.
tr_quotes.author: Germain Martin

tr_quotes.quote: Hiçbir şey ümit etmeyen adama ne mutlu; çünkü hiç hayal kırıklığına uğramaz.
tr_quotes.author: Alexander Pope

tr_quotes.quote: En korkulu anlarda bile ümidini kırma, unutma ki iliklerin en lezzetlisi en sert kemikte bulunur.
tr_quotes.author: Şeyh Sadi

tr_quotes.quote: En karanlık günlerde bile umut bulur, aydınlık günleri düşünürüm, ben evreni yargılamam.
tr_quotes.author: Dalai Lama

tr_quotes.quote: Hayat bu, bir bakarsın her şey bir anda son bulur. Hayat bu, son dediğin an her şey yeniden canlanır.
tr_quotes.author: Şems-i Tebrizi

tr_quotes.quote: Umudunu kaybetme belki döner. Ama çok da ümitli olma belki de gittiğini senden çok sever.
tr_quotes.author: İlhan Berk

tr_quotes.quote: Umutsuzluk nedeniyle korkup kaçma, umut, umutsuzluğun ötesindedir, aş, yürü, geç onu, karanlık geçidin ötesinde, ışık bulacaksın.
tr_quotes.author: Andre Gide

tr_quotes.quote: Ümit, aldatıcı olsa da, hoş bir yolla hayatımızın sonuna doğru ilerlememizi temin eder.
tr_quotes.author: François de La Rochefaucauld

tr_quotes.quote: Bir gün her şeyin daha iyi olacağını düşünmek umudumuz bugün her şeyin iyi olduğunu düşünmek yanılgımızdır.
tr_quotes.author: Voltaire

tr_quotes.quote: Bütün yıldızlar sönse ve her şey kararsa insanın ruhunda tek bir yıldız parlamaya devam eder bu ümit yıldızıdır.
tr_quotes.author: Eflatun

tr_quotes.quote: Her kışın yüreğinde titreyen bir bahar vardır her gecenin peçesinin ardında tebessümle bekleyen bir şafak vardır.
tr_quotes.author: Halil Cibran

en_quotes.quote: Learn from yesterday, live for today, hope for tomorrow. The important thing is not to stop questioning
en_quotes.author: Albert Einstein

en_quotes.quote: All that I am, or hope to be, I owe to my angel mother
en_quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

en_quotes.quote: We must free ourselves of the hope that the sea will ever rest. We must learn to sail in high winds
en_quotes.author: Aristotle Onassis

en_quotes.quote: We must accept finite disappointment, but never lose infinite hope
en_quotes.author: Martin Luther King, Jr.

en_quotes.quote: Hope is being able to see that there is light despite all of the darkness
en_quotes.author: Desmond Tutu

en_quotes.quote: There was never a night or a problem that could defeat sunrise or hope
en_quotes.author: Bernard Williams

en_quotes.quote: I hope I can be as good of a father to my son as my dad was to me
en_quotes.author: Calvin Johnson

en_quotes.quote: The reason I never give up hope is because everything is so basically hopeless
en_quotes.author: Anne Lamott

en_quotes.quote: The present is the ever moving shadow that divides yesterday from tomorrow. In that lies hope
en_quotes.author: Frank Lloyd Wright

en_quotes.quote: Hope is the only bee that makes honey without flowers
en_quotes.author: Robert Green Ingersoll

en_quotes.quote: I choose to live without hope to protect myself from disappointment. It's very effective!
en_quotes.author: Spencer Kayden

en_quotes.quote: If we all worked on the assumption that what is accepted as true is really true, there would be little hope of advance
en_quotes.author: Orville Wright

en_quotes.quote: I hope my story inspires everyone out there to keep hustling and chasing their dreams
en_quotes.author: Nipsey Hussle

en_quotes.quote: We must vote for hope, vote for life, vote for a brighter future for all of our loved ones
en_quotes.author: Ed Markey

en_quotes.quote: The Gospel offers forgiveness for the past, new life for the present, and hope for the future
en_quotes.author: John Sentamu

en_quotes.quote: Neither should a ship rely on one small anchor, nor should life rest on a single hope
en_quotes.author: Epictetus

en_quotes.quote: Let your hopes, not your hurts, shape your future
en_quotes.author: Robert H. Schuller

en_quotes.quote: I said to my soul, be still, and wait without hope, For hope would be hope for the wrong thing
en_quotes.author: T. S. Eliot

en_quotes.quote: I'm going to sit back, light up, and hope I don't chew the cigarette to pieces
en_quotes.author: Vin Scully

en_quotes.quote: With acceptance comes opportunities. And with opportunities come numbers and, most importantly, hope
en_quotes.author: Julie Foudy

en_quotes.quote: Truly saying sorry is never easy to do, and when you are, you just hope it's not too late
en_quotes.author: Justin Tranter

en_quotes.quote: Hope is the magic carpet that transports us from the present moment into the realm of infinite possibilities
en_quotes.author: H. Jackson Brown, Jr.

en_quotes.quote: I always hope to be a better person tomorrow than today
en_quotes.author: Mahershala Ali

en_quotes.quote: God's mercy and grace give me hope - for myself, and for our world
en_quotes.author: Billy Graham

en_quotes.quote: Our constitution is a ray of hope: H for harmony, O for Opportunity, P for people's participation and E for equality
en_quotes.author: Narendra Modi

en_quotes.quote: I'm here to spread a message of hope. Follow your heart. Don't follow what you've been told you're supposed to do
en_quotes.author: J. Cole

en_quotes.quote: My mother-in-law said, 'One day I will dance on your grave.' I said 'I hope you do; I will be buried at sea.'
en_quotes.author: Les Dawson

en_quotes.quote: I hope I get an opportunity to work with Akshay Kumar and Prabhu Deva, as they are very supportive people
en_quotes.author: Kriti Sanon

en_quotes.quote: It is difficult to say what is impossible, for the dream of yesterday is the hope of today and the reality of tomorrow
en_quotes.author: Robert H. Goddard

en_quotes.quote: Tomorrow hopes we have learned something from yesterday
en_quotes.author: John Wayne

en_quotes.quote: Hope is like the sun, which, as we journey toward it, casts the shadow of our burden behind us
en_quotes.author: Samuel Smiles

en_quotes.quote: Disappointment is a sort of bankruptcy - the bankruptcy of a soul that expends too much in hope and expectation
en_quotes.author: Eric Hoffer

en_quotes.quote: What we hope ever to do with ease, we must learn first to do with diligence
en_quotes.author: Samuel Johnson

en_quotes.quote: If people are good only because they fear punishment, and hope for reward, then we are a sorry lot indeed
en_quotes.author: Albert Einstein

en_quotes.quote: A dream is the bearer of a new possibility, the enlarged horizon, the great hope
en_quotes.author: Howard Thurman

en_quotes.quote: Hope in reality is the worst of all evils because it prolongs the torments of man
en_quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

en_quotes.quote: I would rather entertain and hope that people learned something than educate people and hope they were entertained
en_quotes.author: Walt Disney

en_quotes.quote: I wish I had invented blue jeans. They have expression, modesty, sex appeal, simplicity - all I hope for in my clothes
en_quotes.author: Yves Saint Laurent

en_quotes.quote: He who has health, has hope; and he who has hope, has everything
en_quotes.author: Thomas Carlyle

en_quotes.quote: Art is about changing what we see in our everyday lives and representing it in such a way that it gives us hope
en_quotes.author: Kehinde Wiley

en_quotes.quote: We talk a lot about hope, helping, and teamwork. Our whole message is that we are more powerful together
en_quotes.author: Victoria Osteen

en_quotes.quote: The big thing for me is just continuing to be a beacon of hope. And showing people that nothing is impossible
en_quotes.author: Victoria Arlen

en_quotes.quote: Sometimes I feel I hope I am not taking advantage of my stardom
en_quotes.author: Salman Khan

en_quotes.quote: Forgiveness provides hope, joy, and a bright future that nothing else can
en_quotes.author: Paul J. Meyer

en_quotes.quote: Selfishness must always be forgiven you know, because there is no hope of a cure
en_quotes.author: Jane Austen

en_quotes.quote: In the end, that's what this election is about. Do we participate in a politics of cynicism or a politics of hope?
en_quotes.author: Barack Obama

en_quotes.quote: I always craft my words to the point where I think and hope they're perfect before I ever begin sketching
en_quotes.author: Kevin Henkes

en_quotes.quote: On what rests the hope of the republic? One country, one language, one flag!
en_quotes.author: Alexander Henry

en_quotes.quote: All kids need is a little help, a little hope and somebody who believes in them
en_quotes.author: Magic Johnson

en_quotes.quote: Fear is a very explosive emotion, but it has a short life span. It's the sprint. The marathon is hope
en_quotes.author: Mike Huckabee

en_quotes.quote: My dream is of a place and a time where America will once again be seen as the last best hope of earth
en_quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

en_quotes.quote: The sudden disappointment of a hope leaves a scar which the ultimate fulfillment of that hope never entirely removes
en_quotes.author: Thomas Hardy

en_quotes.quote: Hope is independent of the apparatus of logic
en_quotes.author: Norman Cousins

en_quotes.quote: God grant me the courage not to give up what I think is right even though I think it is hopeless
en_quotes.author: Chester W. Nimitz

en_quotes.quote: It's a good place when all you have is hope and not expectations
en_quotes.author: Danny Boyle

en_quotes.quote: Hope smiles from the threshold of the year to come, whispering, 'It will be happier.'
en_quotes.author: Alfred Lord Tennyson

en_quotes.quote: Hope is the only universal liar who never loses his reputation for veracity
en_quotes.author: Robert Green Ingersoll

en_quotes.quote: Youth is easily deceived because it is quick to hope
en_quotes.author: Aristotle

en_quotes.quote: The youth is the hope of our future
en_quotes.author: Jose Rizal

en_quotes.quote: Art is longing. You never arrive, but you keep going in the hope that you will
en_quotes.author: Anselm Kiefer

en_quotes.quote: My hope still is to leave the world a bit better than when I got here
en_quotes.author: Jim Henson

en_quotes.quote: Hope is tomorrow's veneer over today's disappointment
en_quotes.author: Evan Esar

en_quotes.quote: Out of the fires of desperation burn hope and solidarity
en_quotes.author: Sharan Burrow

en_quotes.quote: In tough times, we all hope for knights in shining armor, or the cavalry, to show up and effect change
en_quotes.author: Dean Devlin

en_quotes.quote: Let hope inspire you, but let not idealism blind you. Don't look back, you can never look back
en_quotes.author: Don Henley

en_quotes.quote: The United Nations is our one great hope for a peaceful and free world
en_quotes.author: Ralph Bunche

en_quotes.quote: We are all serving a life sentence, and good behavior is our only hope for a pardon
en_quotes.author: Douglas Horton

en_quotes.quote: A propensity to hope and joy is real riches; one to fear and sorrow real poverty
en_quotes.author: David Hume

en_quotes.quote: I hope that people will realize that the struggle to make a life better with a sibling is worth it
en_quotes.author: Marie Brenner

en_quotes.quote: I think the most important thing is to keep active and to hope that your mind stays active
en_quotes.author: Jane Goodall

en_quotes.quote: No matter what era we're in, we need hope
en_quotes.author: Henry Cavill

en_quotes.quote: I hope when I'm on my deathbed, people forgive me, because there is a lot to forgive
en_quotes.author: Christopher Buckley

en_quotes.quote: When you crash and burn, you have to pick yourself up and go on and hope to make up for it
en_quotes.author: Burt Reynolds

en_quotes.quote: I am not skilled enough or energetic enough to craft a persona. I just have to be who I am and hope people like it
en_quotes.author: Pete Buttigieg

en_quotes.quote: How disappointment tracks the steps of hope
en_quotes.author: Letitia Elizabeth Landon

en_quotes.quote: Pregnancy is something that I always love. It's about hope and the future and a new baby
en_quotes.author: Carine Roitfeld

en_quotes.quote: In our factory, we make lipstick. In our advertising, we sell hope
en_quotes.author: Peter Nivio Zarlenga

en_quotes.quote: In this world you've just got to hope for the best and prepare for the worst and take whatever God sends
en_quotes.author: Lucy Maud Montgomery

en_quotes.quote: When I consider life, it is all a cheat. Yet fooled with hope, people favor this deceit
en_quotes.author: John Dryden

en_quotes.quote: I find hope in the darkest of days, and focus in the brightest. I do not judge the universe
en_quotes.author: Dalai Lama

en_quotes.quote: Hope is the only good that is common to all men; those who have nothing else possess hope still
en_quotes.author: Thales

en_quotes.quote: Come, gentlemen, I hope we shall drink down all unkindness
en_quotes.author: William Shakespeare

en_quotes.quote: I hope people think of me as a bit older. I do have a beard. That makes me look very old
en_quotes.author: Jack Whitehall

en_quotes.quote: At the end of the day, we must go forward with hope and not backward by fear and division
en_quotes.author: Jesse Jackson

en_quotes.quote: I love the song 'I Hope You Dance' by Lee Ann Womack. I was going to write that song, but someone beat me to it
en_quotes.author: Maya Angelou

en_quotes.quote: Faith has to do with things that are not seen and hope with things that are not at hand
en_quotes.author: Thomas Aquinas

en_quotes.quote: It is only by not paying one's bills that one can hope to live in the memory of the commercial classes
en_quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

en_quotes.quote: I hope people remember me for the kind of person that I am, not because of what I do
en_quotes.author: Sean Faris

en_quotes.quote: You spell Bob Hope C-L-A-S-S
en_quotes.author: Lucille Ball

en_quotes.quote: Hope is the last thing a person does before they are defeated
en_quotes.author: Henry Rollins

en_quotes.quote: I hope you love birds too. It is economical. It saves going to heaven
en_quotes.author: Emily Dickinson

en_quotes.quote: There are hurdles, there are handicaps, hardships you have to face in life, but you hope for a great future
en_quotes.author: Anil Kapoor

en_quotes.quote: I always entertain great hopes
en_quotes.author: Robert Frost

en_quotes.quote: Every night when I go to bed, I hope that I may never wake again, and every morning renews my grief
en_quotes.author: Franz Schubert

en_quotes.quote: There is no hope unmingled with fear, and no fear unmingled with hope
en_quotes.author: Baruch Spinoza

en_quotes.quote: I have never emulated any star or celebrity completely, and I hope nobody does the same of me
en_quotes.author: Anushka Sharma

en_quotes.quote: Be hopeful. Be optimistic. Never lose that sense of hope
en_quotes.author: John Lewis

en_quotes.quote: I'm keeping the pixie. I hope I inspire people... it's really cool to have short hair
en_quotes.author: Millie Bobby Brown

en_quotes.quote: I think if there's a great depression there might be some hope
en_quotes.author: Lawrence Ferlinghetti

en_quotes.quote: My goal involves a hammock, a vegetable patch, and a solar-powered house. And I hope to eventually get there
en_quotes.author: Miranda Kerr

en_quotes.quote: War is just when it is necessary; arms are permissible when there is no hope except in arms
en_quotes.author: Niccolo Machiavelli

en_quotes.quote: I try to find hope in struggle and resistance in small places as much as I can
en_quotes.author: Danny Glover

en_quotes.quote: The great moral powers of the soul are faith, hope, and love
en_quotes.author: Ellen G. White

en_quotes.quote: He who despairs of the human condition is a coward, but he who has hope for it is a fool
en_quotes.author: Albert Camus

en_quotes.quote: A whole stack of memories never equal one little hope
en_quotes.author: Charles M. Schulz

en_quotes.quote: If there's a golf course in heaven, I hope it's like Augusta National. I just don't want an early tee time
en_quotes.author: Gary Player

en_quotes.quote: In the factory we make cosmetics; in the drugstore we sell hope
en_quotes.author: Charles Revson

en_quotes.quote: To cherish what remains of the Earth and to foster its renewal is our only legitimate hope of survival
en_quotes.author: Wendell Berry

en_quotes.quote: In your twenties, you think you are immortal. In your thirties, you hope you are immortal
en_quotes.author: Lemmy

en_quotes.quote: I hope each week I grow and impress you guys and make you happy
en_quotes.author: Lauren Alaina

en_quotes.quote: Both hope and pessimism are deeply contagious. And no one is more infectious than a leader
en_quotes.author: John Ortberg

en_quotes.quote: The great hope for a quick and sweeping transition to renewable energy is wishful thinking
en_quotes.author: Vaclav Smil

en_quotes.quote: They have a fine breeze and are now we hope, well on their way
en_quotes.author: Lewis Tappan

en_quotes.quote: School is at once a place of hope, but it's also a laboratory that exposes our differences
en_quotes.author: Najat Vallaud-Belkacem

en_quotes.quote: My philosophy in life is, Decide what you want to do. You have to have something to hope for
en_quotes.author: Lou Holtz

en_quotes.quote: To live without Hope is to Cease to live
en_quotes.author: Fyodor Dostoevsky

en_quotes.quote: Nothing that is worth doing can be achieved in a lifetime; therefore we must be saved by hope
en_quotes.author: Reinhold Niebuhr

en_quotes.quote: I hope for the day when everyone can speak again of God without embarrassment
en_quotes.author: Paul Tillich

en_quotes.quote: Uncertainty is the refuge of hope
en_quotes.author: Henri Frederic Amiel

en_quotes.quote: In my case, there are only two kinds of hope - Bob Hope and no hope
en_quotes.author: Eddie the Eagle

en_quotes.quote: I'm a damaged person, but I have hope and a will to not give up
en_quotes.author: Juliana Hatfield

en_quotes.quote: What can I know? What ought I to do? What can I hope?
en_quotes.author: Immanuel Kant

en_quotes.quote: Hope will never be silent
en_quotes.author: Harvey Milk

en_quotes.quote: Who dares nothing, need hope for nothing
en_quotes.author: Friedrich Schiller

en_quotes.quote: I get butterflies every time a record comes out. I'm like, 'I hope people like it. I hope people buy it.'
en_quotes.author: Dr. Dre

en_quotes.quote: As the country now turns a new leaf, our ambition is to give hope to each and every Afghan
en_quotes.author: Hamid Karzai

en_quotes.quote: I love being able to sing for my job. I am blessed beyond words and I hope my fans can feel that while I'm on stage!
en_quotes.author: Jordin Sparks

en_quotes.quote: I hope I can help Chelsea win many trophies during my time at Stamford Bridge
en_quotes.author: Michy Batshuayi

en_quotes.quote: I hope to always keep stretching myself and not stay in one box or lane
en_quotes.author: Cailee Spaeny

en_quotes.quote: Art's everything we hope life would be, a lot of times
en_quotes.author: Frank Ocean

en_quotes.quote: I hope for nothing. I fear nothing. I am free
en_quotes.author: Nikos Kazantzakis

en_quotes.quote: A person, who no matter how desperate the situation, gives others hope, is a true leader
en_quotes.author: Daisaku Ikeda

en_quotes.quote: If it were not for hopes, the heart would break
en_quotes.author: Thomas Fuller

en_quotes.quote: I hope I am remembered by my children as a good father
en_quotes.author: Orson Scott Card

en_quotes.quote: No matter how dark the moment, love and hope are always possible
en_quotes.author: George Chakiris

en_quotes.quote: We need to keep hope alive and strive to do better
en_quotes.author: Kofi Annan

en_quotes.quote: I give people what they want in the hope that they will begin to want what I want to give them!
en_quotes.author: Sai Baba

en_quotes.quote: Hope is generally a wrong guide, though it is very good company by the way
en_quotes.author: Edward Wood, 1st Earl of Halifax

en_quotes.quote: If I'm the people's poet, then I ought to be in people's hands - and, I hope, in their heart
en_quotes.author: Maya Angelou

en_quotes.quote: We must not lose hope. Hope is an anchor to the souls of men. Satan would have us cast away that anchor
en_quotes.author: Ezra Taft Benson

en_quotes.quote: Change is not a destination, just as hope is not a strategy
en_quotes.author: Rudy Giuliani

en_quotes.quote: Hope is the struggle of the soul, breaking loose from what is perishable, and attesting her eternity
en_quotes.author: Herman Melville

en_quotes.quote: I hope to stand firm enough to not go backward, and yet not go forward fast enough to wreck the country's cause
en_quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

en_quotes.quote: This suspense is terrible. I hope it will last
en_quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

en_quotes.quote: I would like to live a day in the life of an ant and hope not to get squashed
en_quotes.author: Kiowa Gordon

en_quotes.quote: He that lives upon hope will die fasting
en_quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

en_quotes.quote: He is the best physician who is the most ingenious inspirer of hope
en_quotes.author: Samuel Taylor Coleridge

en_quotes.quote: When I grew up, people said, 'You'll never be the man your dad was.' And I said, 'Gee, I hope not.'
en_quotes.author: Rip Torn

en_quotes.quote: We should not moor a ship with one anchor, or our life with one hope
en_quotes.author: Epictetus

en_quotes.quote: About the most originality that any writer can hope to achieve honestly is to steal with good judgment
en_quotes.author: Josh Billings

en_quotes.quote: I hope we will use the Net to cross barriers and connect cultures
en_quotes.author: Tim Berners-Lee

en_quotes.quote: I hope to have communion with the people, that is the most important thing
en_quotes.author: Pope John Paul II

en_quotes.quote: Everything that is done in the world is done by hope
en_quotes.author: Martin Luther

en_quotes.quote: Love is a springtime plant that perfumes everything with its hope, even the ruins to which it clings
en_quotes.author: Gustave Flaubert

en_quotes.quote: I hope I didn't bore you too much with my life story
en_quotes.author: Elvis Presley

en_quotes.quote: The trouble with most people is that they think with their hopes or fears or wishes rather than with their minds
en_quotes.author: Will Durant

en_quotes.quote: Just as despair can come to one only from other human beings, hope, too, can be given to one only by other human beings
en_quotes.author: Elie Wiesel

en_quotes.quote: How wonderful that we have met with a paradox. Now we have some hope of making progress
en_quotes.author: Niels Bohr

en_quotes.quote: Expecting something for nothing is the most popular form of hope
en_quotes.author: Arnold H. Glasow

en_quotes.quote: I have hope in people, in individuals. Because you don't know what's going to rise from the ruins
en_quotes.author: Joan Baez

en_quotes.quote: The work goes on, the cause endures, the hope still lives and the dreams shall never die
en_quotes.author: Edward Kennedy

en_quotes.quote: I hope the fathers and mothers of little girls will look at them and say 'yes, women can.'
en_quotes.author: Dilma Rousseff

en_quotes.quote: One loves to possess arms, though they hope never to have occasion for them
en_quotes.author: Thomas Jefferson

en_quotes.quote: I hope my tongue in prune juice smothers, If I belittle dogs and mothers
en_quotes.author: Ogden Nash

en_quotes.quote: I hope to stop discrimination against young transgender people
en_quotes.author: Jazz Jennings

en_quotes.quote: My hope is that I can continue writing and, in the future, I can just be Maya Soetoro-Ng
en_quotes.author: Maya Soetoro-Ng

en_quotes.quote: America is hope. It is compassion. It is excellence. It is valor
en_quotes.author: Paul Tsongas

en_quotes.quote: Every avalanche begins with the movement of a single snowflake, and my hope is to move a snowflake
en_quotes.author: Thomas Frey

en_quotes.quote: Architecture is basically a container of something. I hope they will enjoy not so much the teacup, but the tea
en_quotes.author: Yoshio Taniguchi

en_quotes.quote: If you keep thinking about what you want to do or what you hope will happen, you don't do it, and it won't happen
en_quotes.author: Desiderius Erasmus

en_quotes.quote: And God help Bruce Springsteen when they decide he's no longer God... They'll turn on him, and I hope he survives it
en_quotes.author: John Lennon

en_quotes.quote: The Pope, I hope, can only be scared by God
en_quotes.author: Donald Trump

en_quotes.quote: Hope is not a resting place but a starting point - a cactus, not a cushion
en_quotes.author: H. Jackson Brown, Jr.

en_quotes.quote: Three grand essentials to happiness in this life are something to do, something to love, and something to hope for
en_quotes.author: Joseph Addison

en_quotes.quote: Extreme hopes are born from extreme misery
en_quotes.author: Bertrand Russell

en_quotes.quote: My intention is to get more involved in social projects so I can give people a message of hope
en_quotes.author: Marta

en_quotes.quote: A very small degree of hope is sufficient to cause the birth of love
en_quotes.author: Stendhal

en_quotes.quote: Festival culture is all about evolving consciousness and generating a sense of unity, hope, and possibility
en_quotes.author: Alex Grey

en_quotes.quote: All hope abandon, ye who enter here!
en_quotes.author: Dante Alighieri

en_quotes.quote: Right now, I have to admit, that I'm more interested in giving people a little bit of hope and goodness
en_quotes.author: Aaron Eckhart

en_quotes.quote: I don't know what can be so dangerous about giving people hope
en_quotes.author: Joel Osteen

en_quotes.quote: To me, we're marketing hope
en_quotes.author: Joel Osteen

en_quotes.quote: Man wants to live, but it is useless to hope that this desire will dictate all his actions
en_quotes.author: Albert Camus

en_quotes.quote: Man needs, for his happiness, not only the enjoyment of this or that, but hope and enterprise and change
en_quotes.author: Bertrand Russell

en_quotes.quote: Anarchy is the only slight glimmer of hope
en_quotes.author: Mick Jagger

en_quotes.quote: God, I hope I wear this jersey forever
en_quotes.author: Derek Jeter

en_quotes.quote: Courage is like love; it must have hope for nourishment
en_quotes.author: Napoleon Bonaparte

en_quotes.quote: Hopeful thinking can get you out of your fear zone and into your appreciation zone
en_quotes.author: Martha Beck

en_quotes.quote: A poor man with nothing in his belly needs hope, illusion, more than bread
en_quotes.author: Georges Bernanos

en_quotes.quote: Our only hope is to control the vote
en_quotes.author: Medgar Evers

en_quotes.quote: Hope and wishes for all that delights will sour in the midst of action not taken and words unsaid
en_quotes.author: Maximillian Degenerez

en_quotes.quote: Where there's tea there's hope
en_quotes.author: Arthur Wing Pinero

en_quotes.quote: I'm proud of my background, so I hope there will be more roles where Hispanics are being portrayed
en_quotes.author: Mario Lopez

en_quotes.quote: We in Colombia always hope for Venezuela to prosper
en_quotes.author: Juan Manuel Santos

en_quotes.quote: A degree of self-awareness is extremely valuable... I hope I have that going forward
en_quotes.author: Nick McDonell

en_quotes.quote: I hope that the women who wear my perfume will have men all over them
en_quotes.author: Reem Acra

en_quotes.quote: I hope people don't get tired of looking at me
en_quotes.author: Ana Beatriz Barros

en_quotes.quote: Politics hates a vacuum. If it isn't filled with hope, someone will fill it with fear
en_quotes.author: Naomi Klein

en_quotes.quote: I've never liked to judge other people in the hope that they won't judge me
en_quotes.author: Gonzalo Sanchez de Lozada

en_quotes.quote: However, I hope I am also judged on my accomplishments as an actor and not just on my pretty face!
en_quotes.author: Jonathan Brandis

en_quotes.quote: Those who hope for no other life are dead even for this
en_quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

en_quotes.quote: I hope all you young girls see yourself up there... we were just like you
en_quotes.author: Mia Hamm

en_quotes.quote: My hopes are not always realized, but I always hope
en_quotes.author: Ovid

en_quotes.quote: Among physicists, I'm respected I hope
en_quotes.author: Stephen Hawking

en_quotes.quote: Hope is the word which God has written on the brow of every man
en_quotes.author: Victor Hugo

en_quotes.quote: You cannot hope to sweep someone else away by the force of your writing until it has been done to you
en_quotes.author: Stephen King

en_quotes.quote: I think it's a mistake to ever look for hope outside of one's self
en_quotes.author: Arthur Miller

en_quotes.quote: Having a sense of purpose is having a sense of self. A course to plot is a destination to hope for
en_quotes.author: Bryant H. McGill

en_quotes.quote: My main hope for myself is to be where I am
en_quotes.author: Woody Harrelson

en_quotes.quote: Nor dread nor hope attend a dying animal; a man awaits his end dreading and hoping all
en_quotes.author: William Butler Yeats

en_quotes.quote: I couldn't continue to live in a bubble and hope to be an empathic actor. It doesn't work
en_quotes.author: Cole Sprouse

en_quotes.quote: Hope is a risk that must be run
en_quotes.author: Georges Bernanos

en_quotes.quote: Hope is a necessity for normal life and the major weapon against the suicide impulse
en_quotes.author: Karl A. Menninger

en_quotes.quote: Every parent is at some time the father of the unreturned prodigal, with nothing to do but keep his house open to hope
en_quotes.author: John Ciardi

en_quotes.quote: I wish you a tolerable Thursday. That's all any of us can hope for
en_quotes.author: April Winchell

en_quotes.quote: I would like this to be a new day. I would hope now that we can focus on doing the people's business
en_quotes.author: Ernie Fletcher

en_quotes.quote: I am prepared for the worst, but hope for the best
en_quotes.author: Benjamin Disraeli

en_quotes.quote: Hope is a good breakfast, but it is a bad supper
en_quotes.author: Francis Bacon

en_quotes.quote: Heaven gives us hope and makes our present burdens easier to bear
en_quotes.author: Billy Graham

en_quotes.quote: I hope that one day when I'll go back to Pakistan, I will build a university like Harvard
en_quotes.author: Malala Yousafzai

en_quotes.quote: I hope not to define myself by suffering
en_quotes.author: Frank Ocean

en_quotes.quote: I'll be like Bob Hope, touring when I'm 100
en_quotes.author: Dolly Parton

en_quotes.quote: Never deprive someone of hope; it might be all they have
en_quotes.author: H. Jackson Brown, Jr.

en_quotes.quote: Never marry someone in hope that they'll change later
en_quotes.author: H. Jackson Brown, Jr.

en_quotes.quote: While we may lose heart, we never have to lose hope
en_quotes.author: H. Jackson Brown, Jr.

en_quotes.quote: So that's the dissenter's hope: that they are writing not for today but for tomorrow
en_quotes.author: Ruth Bader Ginsburg

en_quotes.quote: I do hope that some of my dissents will one day be the law
en_quotes.author: Ruth Bader Ginsburg

en_quotes.quote: The less we deserve good fortune, the more we hope for it
en_quotes.author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

en_quotes.quote: I hope to be working and eating dessert at 93 just like my grandma
en_quotes.author: Rachel Boston

en_quotes.quote: I hope to build a reputation as a science-fiction writer. That's the pitch. We'll see
en_quotes.author: Kurt Vonnegut

en_quotes.quote: Things start out as hopes and end up as habits
en_quotes.author: Lillian Hellman

en_quotes.quote: People need hope and inspiration desperately. But hope and inspiration are only sustained by work
en_quotes.author: Tarana Burke

en_quotes.quote: I hope people remember me as a guy who brought magic to the people. You know, pushed the boundaries of wonder
en_quotes.author: David Blaine

en_quotes.quote: I hope what I do and what I just did inspires people around the world to reach for the skies
en_quotes.author: Nik Wallenda

en_quotes.quote: Well I certainly have learned and I hope I'm moving on and certainly two years of prison was a terrible punishment
en_quotes.author: Jeffrey Archer

en_quotes.quote: There's a reason the Exodus story has inspired so many Americans. It's a narrative of hope
en_quotes.author: Bruce Feiler

en_quotes.quote: There is nothing more valuable than to be healthy and to have the hope of living a better day tomorrow
en_quotes.author: Samuel Eto'o

en_quotes.quote: Hope is a start. But hope needs action to win victories
en_quotes.author: David Joseph Schwartz

en_quotes.quote: Loss of hope rather than loss of life is what decides the issues of war. But helplessness induces hopelessness
en_quotes.author: B. H. Liddell Hart

en_quotes.quote: One of the things you hope you've done as a playwright is create roles that can sustain different interpretations
en_quotes.author: Tracy Letts

en_quotes.quote: I've been acting since I was five, and I hope it's something I can do forever. I love it
en_quotes.author: Madison Pettis

en_quotes.quote: It would be fun to do a reunion show. I hope we do it some day, but it better be soon. We're all getting on
en_quotes.author: William Christopher

en_quotes.quote: Gratitude is merely the secret hope of further favors
en_quotes.author: Francois de La Rochefoucauld

en_quotes.quote: Ideology, politics and journalism, which luxuriate in failure, are impotent in the face of hope and joy
en_quotes.author: P. J. O'Rourke

en_quotes.quote: When hope is not pinned wriggling onto a shiny image or expectation, it sometimes floats forth and opens
en_quotes.author: Anne Lamott

en_quotes.quote: A mission is a place where you ask nonbelievers to come and find faith and hope and feel love
en_quotes.author: Robert H. Schuller

en_quotes.quote: It is only hope which is real, and reality is a bitterness and a deceit
en_quotes.author: William Makepeace Thackeray

en_quotes.quote: Hope is such a bait, it covers any hook
en_quotes.author: Oliver Goldsmith

en_quotes.quote: Hope springs eternal in the human breast: Man never is, but always to be blest
en_quotes.author: Alexander Pope

en_quotes.quote: But what we call our despair is often only the painful eagerness of unfed hope
en_quotes.author: George Eliot

en_quotes.quote: Every day begins with an act of courage and hope: getting out of bed
en_quotes.author: Mason Cooley

en_quotes.quote: History is nothing but gossip about the past, with the hope that it might be true
en_quotes.author: Gore Vidal

en_quotes.quote: I hope to play in the NBA for many seasons, establish my position, and win titles
en_quotes.author: Giannis Antetokounmpo

en_quotes.quote: Hope is the pillar that holds up the world. Hope is the dream of a waking man
en_quotes.author: Pliny the Elder

en_quotes.quote: Looking after my health today gives me a better hope for tomorrow
en_quotes.author: Anne Wilson Schaef

en_quotes.quote: There is a powerful need for people to feel that gust of hope rise up again
en_quotes.author: Cat Stevens

en_quotes.quote: To communicate the truths of history is an act of hope for the future
en_quotes.author: Daisaku Ikeda

en_quotes.quote: Anyone who doesn't believe in miracles is not a realist
en_quotes.author: David Ben-Gurion

en_quotes.quote: One lives in the hope of becoming a memory
en_quotes.author: Antonio Porchia

en_quotes.quote: In an election, one needs both hope and audacity
en_quotes.author: Francois Hollande

en_quotes.quote: I hope they find some way to come up with a new story that involves Beast in my timeline
en_quotes.author: Kelsey Grammer

en_quotes.quote: Overall, I think I'm just lucky, and I hope I continue to be lucky
en_quotes.author: Jeff Hardy

en_quotes.quote: Hope is generally a wrong guide, though it is good company along the way
en_quotes.author: George Savile

en_quotes.quote: If the skies fall, one may hope to catch larks
en_quotes.author: Francois Rabelais

en_quotes.quote: Easter is meant to be a symbol of hope, renewal, and new life
en_quotes.author: Janine di Giovanni

en_quotes.quote: My reputation is as a fiscal hawk. At least, I hope that it is
en_quotes.author: Mick Mulvaney

en_quotes.quote: My hope is that one day I'll be able to work and have a quieter life, but still a creative life
en_quotes.author: James Mercer

en_quotes.quote: There can be hope only for a society which acts as one big family, not as many separate ones
en_quotes.author: Anwar Sadat

en_quotes.quote: There is hope and a kind of beauty in there somewhere, if you look for it
en_quotes.author: H. R. Giger

en_quotes.quote: Hope, deceiving as it is, serves at least to lead us to the end of our lives by an agreeable route
en_quotes.author: Francois de La Rochefoucauld

en_quotes.quote: Will Generation X and the Millennials do a better job running the world than the boomers have? Let's hope so
en_quotes.author: P. J. O'Rourke

en_quotes.quote: The natural flights of the human mind are not from pleasure to pleasure, but from hope to hope
en_quotes.author: Samuel Johnson

en_quotes.quote: The day the Lord created hope was probably the same day he created Spring
en_quotes.author: Bernard Williams

en_quotes.quote: I don't know now if I'm funny. I just keep talking and hope that I hit something that's funny
en_quotes.author: Craig Ferguson

en_quotes.quote: You believe that easily which you hope for earnestly
en_quotes.author: Terence

en_quotes.quote: I hope wholeheartedly that badminton will be as popular and respected as tennis one day
en_quotes.author: Lin Dan

en_quotes.quote: But Hopes are Shy Birds flying at a great distance seldom reached by the best of Guns
en_quotes.author: John James Audubon

en_quotes.quote: I hope to actually get back to painting someday... soon. I sort of transitioned into cartooning from painting
en_quotes.author: Max Cannon

en_quotes.quote: After six years without seeing one, I love just seeing a smile - every smile I see gives me hope
en_quotes.author: Ingrid Betancourt

en_quotes.quote: Take hope from the heart of man and you make him a beast of prey
en_quotes.author: Ouida

en_quotes.quote: Nothing is as simple as we hope it will be
en_quotes.author: Jim Horning

en_quotes.quote: Hope makes people good, a lot of the time. You hope for a brighter future, and resentment is outweighed
en_quotes.author: Daisy Ridley

en_quotes.quote: Ah, I hope to live to 87 and drink from the the goblet of life to the dregs
en_quotes.author: Theo Van Gogh

en_quotes.quote: Hope and fear cannot alter the season
en_quotes.author: Chogyam Trungpa

en_quotes.quote: Beware how you take away hope from another human being
en_quotes.author: Oliver Wendell Holmes, Jr.

en_quotes.quote: No, I'm not interested in politics. I have zero interest. I have interest in hope and people
en_quotes.author: Jay-Z

en_quotes.quote: I love my daddy. My daddy's everything. I hope I can find a man that will treat me as good as my dad
en_quotes.author: Lady Gaga

en_quotes.quote: Even if the hopes you started out with are dashed, hope has to be maintained
en_quotes.author: Seamus Heaney

en_quotes.quote: We often call a certainty a hope, to bring it luck
en_quotes.author: Elizabeth Bibesco

en_quotes.quote: I always believe things are going to work out
en_quotes.author: Francoise Sagan

en_quotes.quote: I hope our hopes and aspirations are bigger than setting records
en_quotes.author: Drew Brees

en_quotes.quote: I hope that we continue with exploration
en_quotes.author: Margaret H. Hamilton

en_quotes.quote: Evil communication corrupts good manners. I hope to live to hear that good communication corrects bad manners
en_quotes.author: Benjamin Banneker

en_quotes.quote: At the moment of death I hope to be surprised
en_quotes.author: Ivan Illich

en_quotes.quote: We must rediscover the distinction between hope and expectation
en_quotes.author: Ivan Illich

en_quotes.quote: I hope I can help guys come out and say, 'All right, dude, I got a manicure... and I liked it.'
en_quotes.author: Ryan Seacrest

en_quotes.quote: When you say a situation or a person is hopeless, you are slamming the door in the face of God
en_quotes.author: Charles L. Allen

en_quotes.quote: The world is bad but not without hope. It is only hopeless when you look at it from an ideal viewpoint
en_quotes.author: Friedrich Durrenmatt

en_quotes.quote: Hope is a talent like any other
en_quotes.author: Storm Jameson
